title: Soft clay rock

properties.name: description
properties.value: A soft clay rock is a protruding rock containing soft clay. A player with a Mining level of 70 or higher can mine soft clay from these rocks, which are found in the Trahaearn mine, granting 5 Mining experience for each ore mined. After being mined, a soft clay rock takes 1.2 seconds to respawn.

The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Soft clay rock
Rocks
Released25 July 2019 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNo
LocationTrahaearn mine
ExamineA rocky outcrop.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID36210

A soft clay rock is a protruding rock containing soft clay. A player with a Mining level of 70 or higher can mine soft clay from these rocks, which are found in the Trahaearn mine, granting 5 Mining experience for each ore mined. After being mined, a soft clay rock takes 1.2 seconds to respawn.

Wearing a bracelet of clay whilst mining soft clay grants two soft clay instead of one for every successful mine.

    • 1.1 Pre roll drops

Mining Info[edit | edit source]

Rocks
Level required 70
Mining XP5 xp
Required toolPickaxe
Respawn time1.2 seconds

Pre roll drops[edit | edit source]

A gem table rolls before the main drop table.[1] There's a chance to receive nothing here so that players can receive no items from a rock even if they are guaranteed to receive an ore in the main drop table.[2] The table is more likely to be rolled if the player has a charged amulet of glory equipped, increasing from 1/256 to 1/86.[3]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
NothingN/A70/32,768; 70/11,008[d 1]N/AN/A
Uncut sapphire132/32,768; 32/11,008[d 1]36315
Uncut emerald116/32,768; 16/11,008[d 1]57030
Uncut ruby18/32,768; 8/11,008[d 1]1,20760
Uncut diamond12/32,768; 2/11,008[d 1]2,742120
  1. ↑ 1.0 1.1 1.2 1.3 1.4 The drop rate is increased while wearing a charged amulet of glory

Main drops[edit | edit source]

The probability for a player to successfully mine soft clay depends on the player's mining level. The rock will deplete after receiving the soft clay. Mining glove variants do not affect soft clay rock depletion.

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Soft clay1Always1741

Conditional drops[edit | edit source]

The following table shows items that can be received in addition to the main resource.

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Clue geode (beginner)1RareNot soldN/A
Clue geode (easy)1RareNot soldN/A
Clue geode (medium)1RareNot soldN/A
Clue geode (hard)1RareNot soldN/A
Clue geode (elite)1RareNot soldN/A
Crystal shard11/127[4]Not soldN/A
Rock golem1Very rareNot soldN/A

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 11 February 2020. (Archived from the original on 27 November 2020.) Mod Ash: "It adds a gem roll before each ore roll, and if you receive a gem you don't get the ore roll."
  2. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 6 July 2020. (Archived from the original on 27 November 2020.) Mod Ash: "Yes, [the mining gem table has] got [...] chance of giving no gem."
  3. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 7 Feb 2017. (Archived from the original on 18 Jun 2019.) Mod Ash: "[the actual increase when wearing the Amulet of Glory while mining is] 1/86 rather than 1/256 for a gem."
  4. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 14 April 2020. (Archived from the original on 15 April 2019.) Mod Ash: "I believe that's 1/127 from any type of ore. And it looks like the Varrock bonus would give you a second shard roll if you got a second ore."
